1.0.name: wordpress/free-feedback-form-plugin
1.0.description:
Plugin Overview:

This plug-in will assist in the implementation of the Kampyle feedback form on your Wordpress site. Simply insert the CSS and JavaScript given by Kampyle to enable the feedback form. In order to create the feedback form you will need to register on Kampyle.com.

Kampyle:

Kampyle is a sophisticated feedback analytics service allowing you to understand what users are doing on your site or blog and why. After registering on Kampyle.com, simply create your sleek feedback form, implement it, all in under five minutes. Visitors will then click on the attractive button on your site in order to leave feedback. Within Kampyle extensive analytics of the feedback will be at your hands.
